description: This file defines an Angular component named AppButtonComponent, which represents a styled button with customizable variants and sizes. It includes input properties for label, aria-label, variant, and size, and emits a click event.

classes.name: AppButtonComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that renders a themed button with options for variant and size, supporting content projection and accessibility attributes.

methods.name: clicked
methods.description: EventEmitter that emits a click event when the button is clicked.
